name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track your fitness goals with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and 50+ workout modes. Water-resistant up to 50m.

name: Leather Messenger Bag
description: Handcrafted genuine leather messenger bag with multiple compartments. Perfect for work or travel.

name: Running Shoes - Pro Series
description: Professional running shoes with advanced cushioning technology and breathable mesh design.

name: Coffee Maker - Automatic
description: Programmable coffee maker with built-in grinder and thermal carafe. Makes perfect coffee every time.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Extra thick yoga mat with non-slip surface. Eco-friendly and perfect for all types of yoga and exercise.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and 12-hour battery life.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and leak-proof.

name: Gaming Mouse RGB
description: High-precision gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting and programmable buttons.

name: Canvas Backpack
description: Vintage-style canvas backpack with laptop compartment. Durable and stylish for daily use.

name: Desk Lamp LED
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with touch controls and USB charging port. Eye-friendly light.

name: Sunglasses - Polarized
description: Polarized sunglasses with UV400 protection. Stylish design for both men and women.

name: Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Combo
description: Slim wireless keyboard and mouse set with long battery life and quiet keys.

name: Plant Pot Set - Ceramic
description: Set of 3 ceramic plant pots with drainage holes. Modern design for indoor plants.

name: Protein Shaker Bottle
description: Leak-proof protein shaker with mixing ball and measurement markings. Dishwasher safe.

name: Wall Clock - Modern
description: Silent wall clock with modern design. Perfect for living room, bedroom, or office.

name: Phone Stand - Adjustable
description: Universal phone stand with adjustable height and angle. Compatible with all smartphones.

name: Dumbbell Set - 2kg Each
description: Neoprene-coated dumbbells for home workouts. Non-slip grip and durable construction.

name: Travel Pillow - Memory Foam
description: Ergonomic neck pillow with memory foam for comfortable travel. Includes carry bag.

name: Wrist Watch - Analog
description: Classic analog watch with stainless steel strap and sapphire crystal glass. Water-resistant.
